titles.title: A resolution honoring the life and legacy of Elizabeth Taylor.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 3/31/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes and honors the courageous, compassionate leadership and many professional accomplishments of Elizabeth Taylor (world-renowned actress and AIDS activist) and offers deepest condolences to her family.
